[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”PPC Management Services” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]What is Adwords or Search Engine Marketing?

• SEM (Search Engine Marketing) is the process of gaining website traffic by purchasing ads on search engines.
• Pay-per-click, a model of internet marketing is most popular type of marketing strategy in which advertisers pay for each time one of their ads is clicked.
• Google Adwords is an “online advertising” service that enables advertisers to compete based on keywords.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]How we can Assist in PPC Management Services?

• Creating campaigns
• Creating an AD group
• Selecting appropriate keywords
• Assigning budget
• Bidding for Keywords
• Google ads management[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10366″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]Google Adwords Agency in Mumbai

• Improve your Revenue with scalable Google ads management.
• Digital Consulting Pandit is a leading Google Adwords Agency in Mumbai that focuses on your success as a whole. Whether you want to improve conversions, traffic to your website, or both, our PPC management services can help you achieve your goals.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Why does it work?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

  • PPC or pay-per-click advertising, is the best way to target your most qualified audience. It helps you to reach them where they’re already looking.
  • You have control over a wide range of advertising options to reach potential customers.
  • A major benefit of PPC advertising is that it’s easy to measure and track.
  • We can deliver a custom PPC campaign to help you increase both conversions and revenue for your company with our PPC Management Services.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Why Choose Digital Consulting Pandit as an Adwords Agency?

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

We Make Your Goals Our Goals

We ensure that we do everything possible to ensure that your campaign goes above and beyond.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

We Hand-Craft Each Campaign Just For You

Our top experts exclusively design each campaign & map your requirements.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

We Provide Transparent ROI Reporting

We maintain full transparency so you can see how our PPC advertising services increases your online revenue.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”FAQs” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”What do our Google AdWords agency’s services include?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]As your Google AdWords agency, we provide you with many solutions to advertise on Google. We are experts with Google Local Services’ ads, remarketing campaigns, or Google Shopping ads.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Is PPC Management Service right for my business?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]According to the marketing expert, PPC Management Services work well for any kind of business. Some digital marketing channels such as search, display, social media marketing, and retargeting are included in PPC ads. if your product is Hard-to-find / unique products or a diverse array of products should also be taken to PPC in account for growth.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Why do I need a PPC specialist?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]You need a google ads consultant for creating an AdWords account. But you will require PPC Management Services to optimize your ad account quality score, manage your bids and optimize campaigns to achieve high click through rates & conversion rates.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”Why our Google Ads agency?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]Choosing Digital consulting Pandit as your Google Ads agency offers top competitive advantages, including:

  • Custom Google Ads strategy
  • Proactive campaign management
  • Strategic bid management
  • Personalized reporting dashboard
  • Transparent pricing
  • Dedicated account manager
  • In-house advertising, copywriting, design, and development team

Stay connected to learn more about why we’re a top Google AdWords agency for businesses like yours.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How long does it take to see results?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]One is able to see an impact in traffic from SEM quickly. However, seeing an outcome in terms of sales will take trial and error. It requires time to research keywords, build a quality score, and good appealing ad copy and landing pages.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” bg_color_value=”__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Are you ready to drive results for your business?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” css=”.vc_custom_1598697488837{margin-top: 22px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Contact us for PPC advertising & Management Services online to improve your company’s revenue today.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_btn title=”Get a Quote!” style=”custom” custom_background=”#2a2a2a” custom_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Related Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
